Interface GridLayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnalysisGridLayer, DefaultGridLayer, FinancialGridLayer, GeoGridLayer, IsometricGridLayer, LogarithmicGridLayer, MedicalGridLayer, PolarGridLayer, SmithChartGridLayer, StatisticalGridLayer, TernaryGridLayer
public interface GridLayer
Strategy interface for grid rendering via a platform-neutral canvas. Allows for custom grid implementations (e.g. standard, medical, polar, etc.).
Since:
2026-01-01 Part of the Zero-Allocation Render Path. High-frequency execution safe.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    renderGrid(ArberCanvas canvas, PlotContext context)
    Renders the chart grid for the given plot context.
    default void
    renderGridBatch(SpatialPathBatchBuilder builder, PlotContext context, GridBatchConfig config)
    Renders the grid into a spatial batch for headless or 3D pipelines.

  • Method Details

    • renderGrid

      void renderGrid(ArberCanvas canvas, PlotContext context)
      Renders the chart grid for the given plot context.
      Parameters:
      canvas - rendering context
      context - plot context with bounds and axis ranges

    • renderGridBatch

      default void renderGridBatch(SpatialPathBatchBuilder builder, PlotContext context, GridBatchConfig config)
      Renders the grid into a spatial batch for headless or 3D pipelines.
      Parameters:
      builder - spatial path batch builder
      context - plot context with bounds and axis ranges
      config - batch configuration
